title: L2 Stay if L1 goes on vacation
question: Up to how much time L2 stays in US if L1 goes on vacation to India for 5-6 months and later on come back in US?
question_tags: Immigration,Bankruptcy,Debt,Debt relief,Bankruptcy and debt,L-2 dependent visa
answers:
As long as the L1 is valid, your L2 should remain valid unless an affirmative action to revoke the L1 or L2 is undertaken.

You might want to give more facts to get a better answer.
